DataElement.preferredName: Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Clinical Study Site Identifier Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the number to identify the site of a study with the Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network (an infrastructure to conduct office-based research that will answer the questions facing general dental practitioners in the routine care of their patients).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Clinical Study Site Identifier
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the identifier for the site of a study with the Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network (an infrastructure to conduct office-based research that will answer the questions facing general dental practitioners in the routine care of their patients).

ObjectClass.preferredName: Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Clinical Study Site
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An infrastructure to conduct office-based research that will answer the questions facing general dental practitioners in the routine care of their patients.:Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, mechanism of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiology, behavior and health services research. :Position in relation to the surroundings.

Concepts.longName: Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network
Concepts.definition: An infrastructure to conduct office-based research that will answer the questions facing general dental practitioners in the routine care of their patients.

Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.
A position in relation to its surroundings.

Property.preferredDefinition: One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

Concepts.definition: One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the identification of cancer research protocols.

DataElementConcept.origin: PEARL CRF:Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the numeric identifier assigned to a clinical facility or other institution working on a clinical trial.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: groups, institutions, or clinical facilities that conduct clinical research or tests, or analyze clinical data.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: revised and updated for ISO compliance
